1引言中介(mediation)是社会科学研究中重要的方法学概念。如果自变量X通过某一变量M对因变量Y产生一定影响,则称M为X和Y的中 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... mediate v 调停 mediation n 调解，仲裁 mediator n 调解人.

entry.def: If someone mediates between two groups of people, or mediates an agreement between them, they try to settle an argument between them by talking to both groups and trying to find things that they can both agree to.

example.ex: My mom was the one who mediated between Zelda and her mom...
example.tran: 我妈妈充当了泽尔达和她妈妈之间的调解人。

example.ex: United Nations officials have mediated a series of peace meetings between the two sides...
example.tran: 联合国官员已经促成了双方的一系列和平会谈。

entry.def: If something mediates a particular process or event, it allows that process or event to happen and influences the way in which it happens.

example.ex: ...the thymus, the organ which mediates the response of the white blood cells...
example.tran: 胸腺——调节白血球的反应的器官

example.ex: People's responses to us have been mediated by their past experience of life.
example.tran: 人们对我们作出的反应受到了他们过去生活经历的影响。

means.word_mean: 1. a negotiator who acts as a link between parties

stems_affixes.word_buile: im无+medi中间+ate……的→无中间的→立刻的
inter在……之间+mediate调解→在中间调节→中间体,媒介物
medi中间+an表名词和形容词→adj.中间的 n.[三角形]中线
medi中间+ocre石山→中间的山→不是高山→平庸
inter在……之间+mediate调解→在中间调节→中间体,媒介物
medi中间+an表名词和形容词→adj.中间的 n.[三角形]中线
mediate[v.调停,作为引起……的媒介]+ion表名词→n.调解
mediate[v.调停,作为引起……的媒介]+or人→n.调停者,仲裁人
medi中间+ate表动词→在[中间]走→调停,调解

sentences.en: He will appear in the role of mediator.
I offered to act as mediator and tried to bring about a reconciliation between the two parties.
sentences.cn: 我主动充当调解人,促使双方和解。
